Fingernails: If all scissors and knives disappeared, one could use their fingernails to cut things. This method is not very efficient, but it is possible.
Bones: Bones can be used as a cutting tool, but it is not recommended as it can cause injury to oneself.
Rocks: Rocks can be used to cut things, but it is not very efficient and can be dangerous.
Dental tools: Dental tools such as pliers and tweezers can be used as a cutting tool, but it is not very efficient.
Paper cutters: Paper cutters can be used to cut paper, but it is not very efficient and may not be useful for cutting other materials.
